title: Smart Data models - PedestrianArea schema
description: Polygonal representation of pedestrian area and limited traffic zones.

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Unique numeric code of the Area

areaType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of Area: PZ(pedestrian zone), AREA_B (Area B), AREA_C (Area C), RZ (restricted zone), LTZ (limited traffic zone).

ordinance.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Reference to the ordinance establishing the Area, and any subsequent amendments thereto.

exemption.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of vehicles authorised to access the exemption from the prohibition.

activationDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The date/time of the area activation.

deactivationDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The date/time of the area deactivation.

resolution.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Any resolution establishing the Area.

locationDetail.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Any location detail of the pedestrian area.

areaNote.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Any note associated to the pedestrian area.

areaSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of sign identifying the Pedestrian Area: PZ (pedestrian area), PT (prohibition of transit), PR (pedestrian route), LTZ (limited traffic zone).

dissuasiveDevice.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Description of any dissuasive device installed in the pedestrian area.
